snippet: The Imagine This series reaped comments from people who offered their own contributions or shared thoughts on how they viewed the arts.
abstract: Imagine This column features New York Times critics Ben Brantley envisioning a Shakespearean battle royale; Holland Cotter picturing a global art museum of the mind; Anthony Tommasini describing a fantasy of eclectic music festivals; Chris Suellentrop proposing an exhibition of video games designed by women and Nate Chinen writing of his father's jazz festival in Hawaii.
lead_paragraph: The Imagine This series reaped comments from people who offered their own contributions or shared thoughts on how they viewed the arts.

headline.seo: Readers Comment on the Imagine This Series
headline.main: As Critics Play Favorites, Readers Line Up to Join
headline.print_headline: As Critics Play Favorites, Readers Line Up to Join
